AMeetingWithAFriend.NAME: Friend?
DESCRIPTIONS: Making your way through the hazards of the Exordium, you come across a robot in shambles, crawling across the floor. NL It reaches towards you. And even though you don't speak the same language you can tell. NL It's asking, NL #b@"Help@ #b@Me."@
You grab the robot's hand and you feel ~#bpower~ surging through you. NL The robot let go as quick as it latched on and fell to the floor, inoperational.
You ignore the robot and let it be taken apart by the monsters of the Spire. NL #bJerk.
